Class XQueryException

Initializes a new instance of the XQueryException class. This exception is thrown when an XQuery operation throws an exception.

Namespace: Figaro.Xml
Assembly: FigaroStub.dll
Syntax
[Serializable]
public class XQueryException : FigaroException, ISerializable, _Exception
Remarks

The purpose of this object is to provide a thorough level of detail regarding exceptions that occur during XQuery operations, splitting the error information into different fields and providing contextual error information according to the information found in Appendix D of the XQuery Language Specification.

Note that the System.Exception.HelpLink property points to the URL of the exception on the XQuery website.
